title: 无尽贪婪 怎么改做奇点需要的方块数
author: 全文rrr

replies.author: 夏天の海
replies.txt_content:
点开minecraft/conifg/Avaritia.cfg然后找到这段话
# Configuration file

"balance!" {
    # Added to the existing modifier to make prices more expensive or cheaper. Can be negative.
    I:"Cost Modifier"=0

    # Added to the existing multiplier to make prices more expensive or cheaper. Can be negative.
    I:"Cost Multiplier"=0
} 
 上面是需要方块的数量 下面是倍数（我曾经改这玩意改出了14w个方块）

replies.author: asdfsh
replies.txt_content: 无尽贪婪会根据你加入的模组来改变压缩的数量，比如神秘时代等模组均会有增加，自己手动貌似改不了，如有帮助，就给个最佳吧

replies.author: 池恩TwT
replies.txt_content:
需要用到 CraftTweaker mod  然后参照这个wiki进行添加魔改 这种方法是可以更改具体数值的..
https://ftb.gamepedia.com/Using_ ... avaritia.Compressor

如果只是想更改大概的倍数 增加个几倍的难度 可以在配置文件中 找到

#Balance modifications for the Compressor.
"balance" {
        #Added to the existing modifier to make prices more expensive or cheaper. Can be negative.
        I:"cost_modifier"=0

        #Added to the existing multiplier to make prices more expensive or cheaper. Can be negative.
        I:"cost_multiplier"=0
}
进行更改

replies.author: 亚宁解说
replies.txt_content:

提取码：ynzs
用这个mod里的**右键压缩机
